main.name: Ariel Leon Flores
main.bio: I'm Ariel ,a newly minted Full-Stack Developper! I have extensive experience in hospitality, sales and customer service and I am fluent in English, French and Spanish. I have always had an interest in Web Developement and in 2020 I decided to see where my interest would take me. After a 4 months Web-Developement bootcamp at Lighthouse Labs, I have decided to jump fully into Web-developement and I'm excited to see where this new journey will take me!

education.description: Scholarship recipient for intensive Web-Development Bootcamp where I learned Javascript, NodeJS, HTML, CSS, ReactJS, Ruby on Rails as well as Databases and Data Modeling

projects.title: Fresh BsQt
projects.category: Grocery Delivery App aiming to offer delivery options for small neighborhood stores within a specified range of users' current location in order to promote buying fresh & Local.

projects.title: Jungle
projects.category: A mini e-commerce application built with Rails 4.2. It is a responsive MPA using a Rails backend with Active Record.
